metadata.title: CVE-2017-2625 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
It was discovered that libXdmcp before 1.1.2 including used weak entropy to generate session keys. On a multi-user system using xdmcp, a local attacker could potentially use information available from the process list to brute force the key, allowing them to hijack other users' sessions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-2625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxdmcp6 - 1:1.1.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxdmcp package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.1.2-3').
